description:
Join us at **Newtown Park Brewing Co** in Bristol this month for an in-person South West Ruby meetup featuring great beer 🍺 (sponsored by Cookpad) and a talk by **Newtown Park Brewing Co** co-founder Michael McKelvaney.

There's time for another speaker. If you're interested in giving a talk about anything Ruby-related, please leave a comment below or message Ollie (https://www.meetup.com/members/208474359).

Schedule

18:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, have a chat
19:00 - "Even Fuller Stack Ruby" by Michael McKelvaney
19:30 - More mingling

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #37 In Person
